lead_paragraph: The president of the film academy has sent an email to its members telling them they have much to be proud of after this year's Oscars ceremony, and reassuring them changes will be made to avoid a repeat of problems like the botched best-picture announcement that closed the show.

headline.main: What’s on TV Friday: ‘Fire at Sea’ and ‘Vice: Trans Youth’
